author: wsjcom
title: Show Us the Evidence in the Missouri Student Race Case
text:
Jillian Kay Melchior writes in “A Dubious Narrative Contributed to the NFL Protests” (op-ed, Feb. 2) that “an exhaustive review of law-enforcement records showed no sign of the incidents [graduate student Jonathan] Mr. Butler described” in his assertion of campus racist acts purportedly directed at him at the University of Missouri. Obviously no reports were filed with the police.
Put law enforcement records aside for a moment. Where, in an age in which every student has a camera in his or her phone, is the photo of the N-word...
